pages.text: The crucible is a device capable of melting the materials required to forge steel. Place the crucible above a heat source. The top four slots of the Crucible are your inputs. Each item used as an input must be unique (cannot be used in more than one slot) and some inputs cannot be mixed together.

In the following pages, there will be a list of recipes for making various outputs in the crucible. Ingredients separated by slashes (/) can only have one unique member be used in the recipe as a flux. Additionally, recipes are also available via JEI, where the top row of ingredients (with numbers) are required and the bottom box of ingredients you can choose between to complete the recipe.
